summary: Reinette and Mirabelle are two young girls. Reinette lives in the countryside, Mirabelle in Paris. They meet during a holiday of Mirabelle in the country, when Reinette helps her to repair ... See full summary »
cast: Joëlle Miquel|Jessica Forde|Mr. Housseau|Mme. Housseau|Philippe Laudenbach|François-Marie Banier|Jean-Claude Brisseau|Yasmine Haury|Gérard Courant|Béatrice Romand|Marie Rivière|David Rocksavage|Jacques Auffray|Haydée Caillot|Fabrice Luchini|Marie Bouteloup|Françoise Valier|Éric Rohmer
title: Cuatro aventuras de Reinette y Mirabelle
